requirements.scenario: Submit form with all valid inputs
steps: Navigate to the Practice Form page
Enter 'John' in the First Name field
Enter 'Doe' in the Last Name field
Select 'Male' as Gender
Enter 'john.doe@example.com' in the Email field
Enter '1234567890' in the Mobile field
Select '15 May 1995' as Date of Birth
Type 'Maths' in the Subjects field and select it
Select 'Sports' in Hobbies
Upload a valid picture
Enter '123 Main St, City, Country' in the Current Address field
Select 'NCR' as State and 'Delhi' as City
Click on Submit button

requirements.scenario: Submit form with missing required fields
steps: Navigate to the Practice Form page
Leave the First Name field empty
Enter 'Doe' in the Last Name field
Leave the Gender selection empty
Enter 'john.doe@example.com' in the Email field
Leave the Mobile field empty
Select '15 May 1995' as Date of Birth
Leave the Subjects field empty
Leave the Hobbies selection empty
Do not upload any picture
Enter '123 Main St, City, Country' in the Current Address field
Leave the State and City selection empty
Click on Submit button

requirements.scenario: Submit form with invalid email format
steps: Navigate to the Practice Form page
Enter 'John' in the First Name field
Enter 'Doe' in the Last Name field
Select 'Male' as Gender
Enter 'john.doe' in the Email field (invalid format)
Enter '1234567890' in the Mobile field
Select '15 May 1995' as Date of Birth
Type 'Maths' in the Subjects field and select it
Select 'Sports' in Hobbies
Upload a valid picture
Enter '123 Main St, City, Country' in the Current Address field
Select 'NCR' as State and 'Delhi' as City
Click on Submit button
